original_text: But he gave him no answer, not even to a single charge, so that the governor was greatly amazed.
korean_text: 한 마디도 대답하지 아니하시니 총독이 크게 놀라워하더라

sentences.original_text: But he gave him no answer
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 그는 그에게 아무 대답도 주지 않았다

sentences.original_text: not even to a single charge
sentences.korean_translation: 단 한 가지 고발에도 대답하지 않았다

sentences.original_text: so that the governor was greatly amazed
